edz.name: EdiZon

edz.patreon.name: Patreon
edz.widget.integer.title: Enter a value
edz.widget.integer.subtitle: This will be the new value for this property.
edz.widget.string.title: Enter some text
edz.widget.string.subtitle: This will be the new text for this property.
edz.gui.main.running.cheatengine.title: Cheat Engine
edz.gui.main.running.cheatengine.subtitl: The cheat engine can be used to inspect and edit a title's memory
edz.gui.main.repos.label.desc: Save Repositories are a easy way to download save files hosted by other people. For more information on how to host your own repository, check out the EdiZon GitHub
edz.gui.main.repos.dialog.title: Add new Repository
edz.gui.main.repos.dialog.desc: Enter a save file repository URL
edz.gui.main.repos.label.norepos: Nothing here yet. Click on the “Add more Repositories” button to add some to your list
edz.gui.main.repos.dialog.download: Downloading and injecting save file. Please wait...
edz.gui.main.cheats.label.desc: Cheats are small programs that are executed in the background while a title is running. Multiple times per second these programs edit the memory of the currently running title. Important to note is, cheats are very fragile. If made incorrectly, changing the area in a game or even just restarting the console can make them stop working. If made properly, a game update will in most cases still break all cheats though and they have to be remade.
edz.gui.main.cheats.overlay.desc: Enabling this will add an entry for EdiZon to your Tesla menu where you can toggle cheats and check out different stats of your Switch during gameplay
edz.gui.main.cheats.overlay.note:
 You can open the menu at any time by pressing ,  and  simultaneously
 To use this feature, you already need to have Tesla installed and running
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.no_cheats: There are no cheats installed for this game.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.no_cheats_onli: There are no cheats installed for this game and none were found Online
Cheats have been found on your system but haven't been loaded yet. Click here to apply them
edz.gui.main.cheats.button.load.online.d: Cheats have been found online but they haven't been loaded yet. Click here to apply them
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.no_title: There's no title running in the background at the moment. Open any title, press the home button and launch EdiZon via the Album without closing the title to toggle cheats.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.syntax_error: There are cheats for this game installed on your system but the cheat service failed to parse them. Checkout the guide for reasons why this could happen.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.outdated: There are cheats for this game installed but they were made for a different game version. If this game just got updated, please be patient as the cheat needs to be redone.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.application_mo: EdiZon is running in application mode and cannot modify the memory of the current title. Please restart EdiZon in Applet mode by opening it through the Album.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.dmnt_cht_missi: EdiZon depends on the dmnt:cht service to run cheats. Please make sure you installed your CFW correctly and that it has support for it.
edz.gui.main.settings.cheatslipsinfo: To use most of the online features of EdiZon a Cheat Slips account is required. Please visit cheatslips.com for more information.
edz.gui.main.settings.account.title: Cheat Slips Account
edz.gui.main.settings.dialog.logout: Do you want to logout of your Cheat Slips Account?
edz.gui.main.settings.pctl.desc: Locks some destructive options like restoring or deleting save files behind the Parential Control PIN.
edz.gui.main.settings.autostart.desc: This will make the cheat overlay be loaded on startup
edz.gui.main.about.label.edz: EdiZon is a multipurpose game enhancement tool for the Nintendo Switch.
edz.gui.main.about.guide.title: EdiZon Guide and Documentation
edz.gui.main.about.credits.1:  Natinusala, for creating Borealis and being super helpful during development!
edz.gui.main.about.credits.2:  averne, for allowing me to use his overlay creation and drawing code!
edz.gui.main.about.credits.3:  All the wonderful people in AtlasNX's #developer-chat, cheers guys!
edz.gui.main.about.credits.4:  Everybody else that worked on EdiZon, this wouldn't have been possible without you!
edz.page.login.title: Cheat Slips
edz.page.login.hint: Enter your Cheat Slips credentials to get access to automatic updates, cheat file downloading and save file uploading. To create an account, please visit https://cheatslips.com
edz.page.login.email.help: Please enter your Cheat Slips email address
edz.page.login.password.help: Please enter your Cheat Slips password
edz.page.login.error: There was an error during login. Make sure you're connected to the internet and that you have generated a API key in your Cheat Slips profile
edz.page.splash.error.ams:
EdiZon depends on many of Atmosphère's latest features. Please update to a version greater than or equal to AMS %s.
Press  to exit
edz.page.splash.error.mem:
EdiZon depends on multiple different Applets in order to function properly. Make sure your system_settings.ini allocates enough memory for them.
Press  to exit
edz.gui.popup.error.nosavefs: There's no save filesystem present for this title. In order to inject save files one has to be created first. This can be done by either opening this title and saving once or by clicking on the button bellow.
edz.gui.popup.information.launch.title: Launch title
edz.gui.popup.information.launch.subtitl: Close EdiZon and launch this title
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.title: Create backup
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.subtitle: Create a backup of your save data
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.keyboard: Enter a name under which the backup will be saved
edz.gui.popup.management.restore.title: Restore backup
edz.gui.popup.management.restore.subtitl: Restore a previously created save file backup
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.dropdown: Select the backup you want to restore
edz.gui.popup.management.delete.title: Delete save data
edz.gui.popup.management.delete.subtitle: Delete the save data this game
edz.gui.popup.management.delete.confirm: Are your sure you want to delete your save data? This cannot be undone without a backup.
edz.gui.popup.management.createfs.title: Create Save FS
edz.gui.popup.management.createfs.subtit: Create a save file system for this title and account
edz.gui.cheatengine.title: Cheat Engine
edz.gui.cheatengine.subtitle.nosearches: No search has been started yet
edz.gui.cheatengine.subtitle.onesearch: The titles memory has been searched once
edz.gui.cheatengine.subtitle.moresearche: The titles memory has been searched %d times
edz.gui.cheatengine.fastmode.desc: If enabled, only aligned values will be searched
edz.gui.cheatengine.value.input.title: Enter a value to search for
edz.gui.cheatengine.value.input.desc: The cheat engine will search the title's memory for this value
edz.gui.cheatengine.dialog.searching: Searching memory. This might take a while...

edz.gui.hexeditor.dialog: Do you want to inspect the HEAP or MAIN region?
